text:
ADD CONGRESSMEN PRESUMED IN FAVOR OF
PUBLIC TELEVISION ACT
June 21, 1967
Presumed in favor:
Kentucky, Hindman
Ohio, Cleveland
Tennessee, Nashville
Vermont, Ruthland
Washington, Spokane
Carl D. Perkins (D)
Charles Vanik (D)
Richard H. Fulton (D)
Robert T. Stafford (R)
Thomas S. Foley (D)
Not in favor, but will not oppose:
Iowa, Waterloo H. R. Gross (R)
Kentucky, Jeffersontown Marion G. Snyder (R)
In favor, but will not vote:
Ohio, Cincinnati
Robert Taft, Jr.
